history.wish: i wish the devs of whatcha ma call it DON’T OPTIMIZE THIER SHADERS! BECAUSE I’M EVILL!!
history.reason: i see here that koolioguy has wished for the exact opposite of hablethedev's wish! this is a rather strange choice, but i suppose i will make it be on the nice list for simply resulting in nothing happening

history.wish: i wish for you to teach me rizz
history.reason: Oh, koolioguy, you're back again with another wish! While I appreciate your enthusiasm, I'm afraid teaching "rizz" falls outside of my jolly capabilities. It's not something I can just bestow upon you, and it's also a bit too close to wishing for me to change how you interact with others. That sounds like something you'll have to learn on your own journey, not something for Santa to grant!
